query.esql:
FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait")

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait")

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait")

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS norm_load = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS norm_load = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS norm_load = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL AND 
attributes.state == "used"
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL AND 
attributes.state == "used"
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL AND 
attributes.state == "used"
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| STATS BY 
os = resource.attributes.os.description ,
ip = resource.attributes.host.ip,
name = resource.attributes.host.name
| EVAL ip_str = TO_STRING(ip)
| EVAL str = CONCAT("os.description$",os, "|",
"host.ip$", ip_str, "|",
"host.name$", name
)
| EVAL arr = SPLIT(str, "|")
| MV_EXPAND arr
| EVAL pairs = SPLIT(arr, "$")
| EVAL `Resource Attribute` = MV_FIRST(pairs), value = MV_LAST(pairs)
| keep `Resource Attribute`, value
| STATS `Value` = MV_DEDUPE(TOP(value, 400, "asc")) BY `Resource Attribute`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| STATS BY 
os = resource.attributes.os.description ,
ip = resource.attributes.host.ip,
name = resource.attributes.host.name
| EVAL ip_str = TO_STRING(ip)
| EVAL str = CONCAT("os.description$",os, "|",
"host.ip$", ip_str, "|",
"host.name$", name
)
| EVAL arr = SPLIT(str, "|")
| MV_EXPAND arr
| EVAL pairs = SPLIT(arr, "$")
| EVAL `Resource Attribute` = MV_FIRST(pairs), value = MV_LAST(pairs)
| keep `Resource Attribute`, value
| STATS `Value` = MV_DEDUPE(TOP(value, 400, "asc")) BY `Resource Attribute`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| STATS BY 
os = resource.attributes.os.description ,
ip = resource.attributes.host.ip,
name = resource.attributes.host.name
| EVAL ip_str = TO_STRING(ip)
| EVAL str = CONCAT("os.description$",os, "|",
"host.ip$", ip_str, "|",
"host.name$", name
)
| EVAL arr = SPLIT(str, "|")
| MV_EXPAND arr
| EVAL pairs = SPLIT(arr, "$")
| EVAL `Resource Attribute` = MV_FIRST(pairs), value = MV_LAST(pairs)
| keep `Resource Attribute`, value
| STATS `Value` = MV_DEDUPE(TOP(value, 400, "asc")) BY `Resource Attribute`

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `CPU Utilization` = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS `Memory Utilization` = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000
